hero.tagline: A Business Bridge between Africa and the Indian Ocean

welcome.title: Welcome to AIOCCI
welcome.paragraph1: The African Indian Ocean Chamber of Commerce & Industry (AIOCCI) is an independent business platform dedicated to strengthening trade, investment, and economic cooperation between Africa and the Indian Ocean region.
welcome.paragraph2: AIOCCI connects companies, investors, institutions, and economic stakeholders through business facilitation, strategic networking, and the organization of high-level corporate and economic events.
welcome.paragraph3: Our objective is to foster sustainable growth, cross-border partnerships, and regional economic integration across Africa, the Indian Ocean, and international markets.

foundingStory.title: About AIOCCI
foundingStory.description:
AIOCCI is a business-oriented Chamber of Commerce and Industry bringing together private sector leaders, institutions, entrepreneurs, and investors committed to developing strong and sustainable economic links between Africa and the Indian Ocean region.

Founded as an independent and inclusive platform, AIOCCI acts as a bridge between markets, cultures, and economic opportunities.
foundingStory.imageAlt: A diverse group of African and Indian Ocean professionals in formal business attire during a business meeting in a modern office with panoramic views

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a leading economic platform connecting Africa and the Indian Ocean, facilitating trade, investment, innovation, and sustainable development at regional and international levels.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Promote trade and investment between Africa and the Indian Ocean region; facilitate business connections and cross-border partnerships; support companies in their international expansion; organize high-level corporate and economic events; and strengthen regional integration and private sector cooperation.

section.title: Our Vision & Mission
section.subtitle: Building economic bridges between Africa and the Indian Ocean for shared prosperity

section.title: What We Do
section.subtitle: Tailored solutions at every stage of your development

businessTrade.title: Business & Trade Facilitation
businessTrade.description: We assist companies in identifying business opportunities, partners, and markets across Africa and the Indian Ocean region.

investment.title: Investment Promotion
investment.description: AIOCCI promotes investment opportunities and connects investors with high-potential projects, enterprises, and strategic initiatives.

networking.title: Networking & Representation
networking.description: AIOCCI provides a structured platform for networking, representation, and advocacy for its members at national, regional, and international levels.

events.title: Corporate & Economic Events
events.description: AIOCCI designs and delivers high-level events, including:

expoMauritius.title: Africa Business Expo
expoMauritius.description: A large-scale international business and investment exhibition bringing together African, Indian Ocean, and global companies, investors, and institutions. The Expo aims to position Mauritius as a strategic hub for African and Indian Ocean trade and investment.

expoDubai.title: Africa Business Expo
expoDubai.description: An international edition of the Africa Business Expo, connecting African businesses with investors, partners, and markets in the Middle East and beyond, with a strong focus on trade, investment, and global expansion.

aiSummit.title: AI Meets Africa Summit
aiSummit.description: Positioned as the largest Artificial Intelligence summit in Africa, AI Meets Africa Summit brings together policymakers, tech leaders, investors, startups, researchers, and institutions to shape the future of AI, digital transformation, and innovation across the continent.

emploi.title: Carrefour Emploi & Études
emploi.description: A major employment and education fair organized in Madagascar, connecting students, professionals, universities, training institutions, and recruiters at national and international levels.

educationExpo.title: International Education Expo
educationExpo.description: Bringing together international universities, education providers, and students, with a strong focus on international mobility, skills development, and academic partnerships.

ceoForum.title: CEO Business Forum
ceoForum.description: A high-level business forum dedicated to CEOs, executives, and decision-makers, fostering dialogue on leadership, investment, economic strategy, and private-sector-driven development in Africa and the Indian Ocean region.

membership.title: Membership
membership.whyTitle: Why Become a Member of AIOCCI?
benefits: Access to a trusted business network across Africa and the Indian Ocean
Participation in high-level corporate and economic events
Access to trade missions, forums, and delegations
Strategic positioning within a growing regional and international platform

founding.title: Founding Members
founding.description: Reserved for leading companies and institutions supporting the launch, governance, and strategic orientation of AIOCCI.

corporate.title: Corporate Members
corporate.description: Open to companies, SMEs, startups, investors, and professional organizations.

institutional.title: Institutional & Partner Members
institutional.description: Open to chambers of commerce, institutions, embassies, and international organizations.

collaboration.title: Strategic Collaboration
partners: Chambers of commerce and business councils
collaboration.conclusion: Partnerships are built around concrete actions such as joint events, trade missions, forums, and collaborative initiatives.

governance.title: Governance
governance.intro: AIOCCI operates under a transparent and inclusive governance model, ensuring:
governance.conclusion: The Chamber promotes collaboration between the private sector, institutions, and economic stakeholders.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.intro: Whether you are a company, investor, institution, or partner, AIOCCI welcomes collaboration and dialogue.

details.label: Expansion
details.value: New offices opening soon in other African countries

footer.organization: African Indian Ocean Chamber of Commerce & Industry
footer.description: Connecting Africa and the Indian Ocean through trade, investment, economic cooperation, and high-level corporate events.
footer.headquarters: Headquartered in Madagascar, with offices in Delescar and Boris, and expanding across Africa.
